name: Kingdom Empire III: Eastern Warlord
description:
Assume the role of either as an Emperor, Shogun or Khagan and command army on the conquest of the Eastern kingdom, featuring:

- 3 Civilizations to choose from.

- Random generated map with customizable difficulty setting.

- Nice music (credit: Seven Kingdom AA)

- Characterize your playstyle either as a hated tyrant or beloved benevolent ruler.

- Intuitive control and familiar RTS formula.

- Formulate your own tactics and strategies to emerge as victorious ruler.
